summary: A couple unable to have children enlist the aid of a surrogate, only for the wife to be driven to insanity and murder by her paranoia.
cast: Tracy Nelson|Linden Ashby|Heather Tom|Barbara Niven|Jenna Wheeler-Hughes|Anna Ferguson|Sophie Gendron|Neil Napier|Tyrone Benskin|Shannon Gamble|Luigi Saracino|Lynne Adams|Kate Drummond|Paul Finnigan|Jessica Gaffney|Claude Huard|Kathy Logan|Mercedes Papalia|Mark Saikaly
title: La rival
